Under the divine protection of Ashera, the
goddess of order, she battled Yune as one
of the Three Heroes. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Radiant Dawn.

Mythic Effect: Astra
Boost: HP+5, Atk+3

Grants allies this Mythic Effect during Astra
season, if the Astra blessing has been conferred
and if this unit enters battle in Aether Raids with
them: Astra-blessed allies boost the Aetheric
Lift acquired for successful attacks during Astra
season. (This boost is limited to the number of
Mythic Heroes × the number of Heroes with the
blessing conferred × 10.)

During Astra season, this Mythic Hero will
boost Aetheric Lift acquisition for successful
attacks depending on number of merges. (This
boost is limited to the number of times the unit
has been merged × 1.)

Unit can counterattack regardless of foe's range.
Inflicts Spd-5. Unit attacks twice (even if foe
initiates combat).

Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Res. Disables
non-Special skills that "reduce damage by X%."

Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
If unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies
or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, grants
Atk/Def+6 during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+3 to unit for 1 turn.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+4 to unit for 1 turn.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+5 to unit for 1 turn.
